Proportional Hazards Regression Model Fit Summary Table

An rtable format of coxph object for further annotation on top of Kaplan-Meier grob

t_coxph(fit_coxph, info_coxph = "Cox Porportional Hazard Model")

Arguments

fit_coxph

a class coxph object.
info_coxph

label information for Cox PH model.

Examples


OS <- data.frame(AVAL = abs(rnorm(200)),
                 CNSR = sample(c(0, 1), 200, TRUE),
                 ARM = sample(LETTERS[1:3], 200, TRUE),
                 SEX = sample(c("M","F"), 200, TRUE),
                 RACE = sample(c("AA", "BB", "CC"), 200, TRUE),
                 ECOG = sample(c(0, 1), 200, TRUE))
fit_coxph <- coxph(Surv(AVAL, 1-CNSR) ~ ARM + strata(RACE), data = OS, ties = "exact")
tbl <- t_coxph(fit_coxph)
tbl
#>                    HR                 95% CI of HR            Wald p-value  
#> ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
#> ARMB             1.1437             (0.6787, 1.9274)             0.614      
#> ARMC             1.4129             (0.8587, 2.325)              0.1737
